title: 259：不靠谱的记忆
intro:
可能大家会觉得，只有当我们的脑子出了点问题的时候，才会把没有发生过的事情当作发生过。但事实上，记忆比我们想象得要不靠谱太多。今天，我们就一起来颠覆记忆！
 
 
  
 
 
 
 文案：冰枫
 
 
 主播：旭岽、冰枫
 
 
 后期：旭岽
 
 
 
  
 
 
  
 

 
 
 Reference
 
 
 [1] Shaw, J. (2016). The memory illusion: Remembering, forgetting, and the science of false memory. Random House.
 
 
 [2] Braun, K. A., Ellis, R., & Loftus, E. F. (2002). Make my memory: How advertising can change our memories of the past. Psychology & Marketing, 19(1), 1-23.
 
 
 [3] Brown, E., Deffenbacher, K., & Sturgill, W. (1977). Memory for faces and the circumstances of encounter. Journal of Applied Psychology, 62(3), 311-318. doi:10.1037/0021-9010.62.3.311
 
 
 [4] Loftus, E. F., & Palmer, J. C. (1974). Reconstruction of automobile destruction: An example of the interaction between language and memory. Journal of Verbal Learning and Verbal Behavior, 13(5), 585-589.
 
 ...
